channel.title: [tut]Make a 562 loading 602 webclient! [noob friendly]!
channel.description:
Hi and welcome to my tut to make a 562 loading 602 on the deob's client I released. You can find the client [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473061.0.html]HERE[/url].
Difficulty : 1/10, It's really not difficult!
Needed : - A webhost (I use x10hosting.com) - JarMAKER (download [url=http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html]here[/url]) - The 562 loading 602 client (I posted the link above) - JDK - A Brain
K, first search client.java in the client files and search 127.0.0.1 in the file. There you can change the IP.
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0553/change_IP.png[/img]
Then open jarmaker with the batch file, it will debug.
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0288/open_the_batch.png[/img]
Then, you need to choose the output file, I chosen the desktop.
[img]http://a.imagehost.org/0406/output_file.png[/img]
Next, you need to choose the output name and select the input directory (bin in the client files)
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0863/Output_Name_Input_Directory.png[/img]
Then, you have to set the main-class, just write client in the main-class emplacement.
[img]http://a.imagehost.org/0595/main-class.png[/img]
Now your done for the JAR, your client should run opening this only file.
[img]http://a.imagehost.org/0128/Done_for_that.png[/img]
K.. next you have to sing your jar, follow the instructions on the pic. The only thing not explained on the pic is : you need to choose your keystore.
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0141/Sing_Jar.png[/img]
Now this is the website part, if you didn't got a website, you only need to register on x10hosting.com Upload your Signed jar file and rename it jos.jar. Next you have to create a file called webclient.php. There are the only 2 things you should have in your file manager.
[img]http://a.imagehost.org/0965/upload.png[/img]
Now you have to edit the webclient.php there's the code [code=html]<html> <title> MoparTut </title> <body onbeforeunload="javascript:alert('Be sure your account is logged out before closing this page!');"> <applet name="MoparTut" width="100%" height="100%" archive="jos.jar" code="client.class" mayscript> <param name="worldid" value="2" /> <param name="members" value="1" /> <param name="modewhat" value="2" /> <param name="modewhere" value="2" /> <param name="safemode" value="1" /> <param name="lang" value="0" /> <param name="affid" value="0" /> <param name="settings" value="ROEqp2kbj*NX9PSCbdgpOvokkMwrCkXjg3c6KXgaLZY" />
<param name="cookieprefix" value="" /> <param name="cookiehost" value=".google.com" /> <param name="plug" value="0" />
<param name="js" value="1" /> <param name="game" value="0" /> <param name="colourid" value="0" /> </applet>
</body> </html>[/code]
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0868/Webclient_php_code.png[/img]
AND YOUR DONE!!!
Now go to your website and it should give something like this
[img]http://c.imagehost.org/0645/and_your_done.png[/img]
Post your errors if you got some!
As the title said : It's noob friendly! :D
I hope I helped! :D
